summary: The meeting focused on strategies for collecting data from users and the process of importing that data into our database. Participants discussed various methods of data collection and the technical requirements for integration. The importance of ensuring data accuracy and user privacy was emphasized.
decisions: We will use a web form for data collection.
Data will be imported into the database weekly.

items.title: Create web form for data collection
items.details: Develop a user-friendly web form that allows users to input their data. The form should include validation to ensure data accuracy and comply with privacy standards.

items.title: Set up database import process
items.details: Establish a weekly process for importing collected data into the database, ensuring that the data is properly formatted and validated before import.
